explanations.machine learning: The paper uses machine learning techniques such as Artificial Neural Networks and Support Vector Machine for financial distress prediction.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (Logit model, Artificial Neural Networks, Support Vector Machine) are supervised learning techniques as they involve training on labeled data to predict financial distress.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on classifying firms into distressed or non-distressed categories using various machine learning models.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions using Support Vector Machine (SVM) techniques for financial distress prediction and compares its performance with other models.
explanations.SVM: SVM is used as one of the primary techniques for financial distress prediction in the paper.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions using Artificial Neural Networks as one of the techniques for predicting financial distress.
